channel.title: WhatPulse
channel.description:
Be sure to Join my new team: RS2 Servers
What is WhatPulse? Whatpulse is a handy little device that counts your: Keys Clicks Mouse Distance and then sends it back to the website and counts a subtotal and ranks you among thousands of other users.
What is a team? A Team, on Whatpulse, is a group of people who add their clicks, keys, and mouse distance together and compare to other teams.
What are my WhatPulse Stats? Keys: 1,790,000 Clicks: 1,570,000 Mouse Distance: 60+ Miles Rank: 34100
How do I get WhatPulse? First, go to WhatPulse.org, click register. Then once your done and registered, click downloads and either do this one: http://whatpulse.org/downloads/10/ or http://whatpulse.org/downloads/11/
Then once your done, downloaded, and installed, you should see a Large W by the time on your computer.
This should automatically start counting if it is showing. Just let it go, and every once in a while, Right-Click on the W and click pulse
Wanna see the clicks and keys you got? Right Click and click 'Spawn Geek Dialog'
How do I join RS2 Servers Team? Go to: http://whatpulse.org/stats/teams/13053/
I am SI Monk
I hope you join.
Thanks

item.title: WhatPulse
item.dc:creator: @Ice_Age_Elmo Ice Age Elmo
item.description:
@Ice_Age_Elmo wrote:

Be sure to Join my new team: RS2 Servers

What is WhatPulse?
Whatpulse is a handy little device that counts your:
Keys
Clicks
Mouse Distance
and then sends it back to the website and counts a subtotal and ranks you among thousands of other users.

What is a team?
A Team, on Whatpulse, is a group of people who add their clicks, keys, and mouse distance together and compare to other teams.

What are my WhatPulse Stats?
Keys: 1,790,000
Clicks: 1,570,000
Mouse Distance: 60+ Miles
Rank: 34100

How do I get WhatPulse?
First, go to WhatPulse.org, click register. Then once your done and registered, click downloads and either do this one:
http://whatpulse.org/downloads/10/
or
http://whatpulse.org/downloads/11/

Then once your done, downloaded, and installed, you should see a Large W by the time on your computer.

This should automatically start counting if it is showing. Just let it go, and every once in a while, Right-Click on the W and click pulse

Wanna see the clicks and keys you got? Right Click and click ‘Spawn Geek Dialog’

How do I join RS2 Servers Team?
Go to:

WhatPulse

Team not found! | WhatPulse

Get to know your time with your computer

I am SI Monk

I hope you join.

Thanks
